lines.text: Now I see why the unemployed have so many children.
When you catch that kidnapper, I want you to lock me in a room with him for 20 minutes and throw away the key.
That's the barrel they have me over. They don't have to trust me. I have to trust them.
"King David was much moved and thus he said, O my son Absalom, my son, my son, Absalom! Would God I had died for thee, O Absalom, my son, my son!"
[while crying and holding and comforting David Stannard, who has just learned that his son appears to have been killed by the kidnappers. From 2 Samuel, Chapter 18, Verse 33]

[closing line]
"This my son was dead and is alive again; he was lost, and is found!"
[When David Stannard's son is discovered to be alive after all. From St Luke, Chapter 15, Verse 24]
